content:
OUT! STUMPED! Mahedi Hasan will finish off by taking two wickets in his last over! Hasan bowls it fuller and wide outside off. Muhammad Jawadullah comes down the track and heaves across the line, but misses on the outer edge. Jaker Ali does the rest of the job to glove the delivery and thumps the stumps. Litton Das will have a smile on his face after having his first victory as the leader of his side! Bangladesh wins the encounter by 27 runs!
Muhammad Jawadullah st J Ali b M Hasan 6 (5b 1x4 0x6)

FOUR! DROPPED! A lazy attempt from an experienced player at the deep! Mahedi Hasan bowls it fuller, with no pace on it. Muhammad Jawadullah crouches a bit and swipes it toward the left of the deep mid-wicket fielder. Shanto jogs and tries to take the catch but spills it out toward the fence. Four runs for Muhammad Jawadullah!
Short, on the stumps. Muhammad Jawadullah punches it toward backward point.
Tossed up, on off. Muhammad Jawadullah comes down the track and lofts it over the cover fielder for a brace.
Fuller, on off. Muhammad Jawadullah pushes it toward cover for no run.

OUT! TAKEN! Another one bites the dust! Mahedi Hasan bowls it fuller, on middle and leg. Haider Ali charges down the track and for a slog but fails to connect it properly. The ball loops toward long on and Shanto has taken the skier.
Haider Ali c sub Najmul Hossain Shanto b Mahedi Hasan 0 (3b 0x4 0x6)
Bangs another short, fourth one in a row. Matiullah Khan once again heaves but misses.
Back of a length, over off and middle. Matiullah Khan misses the pull.
Bouncer, on middle and leg. Matiullah Khan looks to pull but misses.

Short, on off. Matiullah Khan looks to pull but fails to get anything from the willow. Hasan Mahmud appeals for a caught behind but the umpire turned it down. Mahmud seems confident with the appeal though.
WIDE! Short, down the leg. Matiullah Khan looks to pull and misses.

OUT! IN AIR... TAKEN! Make it three for Hasan Mahmud! Fires a short one outside off. Asif Khan backs a bit and looks to loft it over the cover but gets the connection from the toe end of his blade. The ball balloons high up in the skies toward the front foot long off fielder and Tawhid Hridoy catches it safely into his hands.
Asif Khan c T Hridoy b H Mahmud 42 (21b 3x4 4x6)
Back of a length and angled into the batter, Asif Khan swings it away flat but straight to deep mid-wicket and denies the single.
Just back of a length and around off, dabbed away down to short third and Haider wants a single but he is sent back.

Oh, just out of reach! Mustafizur Rahman bowls it on a hard length and bowls it wide outside off. Asif Khan backs away and goes aerial but mistimes it. The ball goes over mid off where Litton Das runs back over his head and puts the dive in but ca't grasp it. Just a single then.
Short, angling across the line. Asif Khan looks to slap it but misses.
LEG BYE! Back of a length, on off. Haider Ali hops and tries to dab it but thumps his pad and the ball rolls toward short third for one.

OUT! CAUGHT! Mustafizur Rahman is showing why he is one of the most recognised death bowlers in the world! Back of a length, angling wide outside off. Muhammad Zuhaib puts his weight on his backfoot and looks to slash it up and over the deep cover region, but gets the top edge. The ball loops toward the deep cover-point region and Tawhid Hridoy dives to his front to gets the skier.
Muhammad Zuhaib c T Hasan b M Rahman 0 (2b 0x4 0x6)
Short and wide outside off. Asif Khan slaps it toward deep cover for one.
Back of a length, outside off. Muhammad Zuhaib pats it toward point for no run.

OUT! IN AIR... TAKEN! Hasan Mahmud picks his second wicket of the night! Bowls it short, outside off once again. Sanchit Sharma rocks back and attempts to lash it out over deep cover but fails to get the timing right. The ball loops toward the back of the cover fielder. It is the skipper, Litton Das, who back tracks and revser scoops the catch safely into his hand.
Sanchit Sharma c L Das b H Mahmud 4 (5b 0x4 0x6)
Back of a length, outside off. Sanchit Sharma looks to slash it over the cover region but misses.
Short, on the stumps. Asif Khan pulls it toward his leg side for one run.
FOUR! Hopes are very much alive for United Arab Emirates! Bowls it fuller, around off. Asif Khan punches it hard toward long off fence for a boundary.
SIX! BOOM! On a length, outside off. Asif Khan swats it across the line and gets the middle of bat. The ball loops over deep mid-wicket fence and gets six more runs.

DROPPED! It was a tough chance though! Back of a length, away from the batter. Sanchit Sharma looks to slice it up and cover cover but gets the outer part of his willow. The ball loops toward the third man, where the fielder patrolling the deep backward region has a chase. He puts a dive but spills the skier.
Back of a length, on off. Asif Khan stabs it toward mid off and gets a single.

Oh my word! Just short of the keeper. Mustafizur Rahman fires a bouncer this time, on middle. Asif Khan ducks under the delivery but lifts his willow up. The ball catches the outer edge of the bat and loops toward the front right of the keeper. Jaker Ali has a chase, but he is no way near the ball.
Touch fuller, outside off. Asif Khan attempts to heave it across the line but misses on the inner edge.
Change of pace, back of a length, angling across the right-hander. Asif Khan looks to poke at it but misses on the outer edge.
Fuller, just outside off. Sanchit Sharma opens the face of his willow and steers it toward deep backward point for one.
FOUR! That's been spanked away! A bit too short and wide, Asif Khan stands upright and slaps the ball in front of square on the off side for a boundary.
Tossed up on middle and leg, Sanchit Sharma clips it away through wide mid on and picks up a single.

OUT! CAUGHT! Another one bites the dust and Dhruv Parashar never looked settled out there. Tanvir Islam floats this one up, slower and fuller around off. Parashar gets low and looks to swing it away, ends up snatching it across the line and straight into the hands of the long on fielder. Najmul Hossain Shanto takes a simple catch and UAE have lost half their side.
Dhruv Parashar c sub Najmul Hossain Shanto b Tanvir Islam 3 (7b 0x4 0x6)
Parashar backs away early but the ball gets fired in outside off. Parashar tries to force it off the back foot and lofts it in the gap between long off and deep covers, picking up a couple of runs.
Flights it up a bit, on a length and slides it in from around off, Parashar gets inside the line to sweep but can't get it away.
Bowled shorter and around middle and leg, Dhruv can't quite get it away on the leg side.
Nagging length wide of the off stump, dabbed away off the under edge towards the keeper by Asif. Just a single and the wicket off the over.
Nice and full, around the fifth stump line stroked away to extra cover.
Fuller in length and outside off, driven uppishly and over the cover region for a single.
Shortish ball around middle, sticking in the pitch. Dhruv Parashar tentatively pushes at it and lobs it just to the leg side.
Oh, an appeal for caught behind but turned down! Perfect length, on off, just straightening down the line. Dhruv Parashar gets squared up and the ball zips past the outside edge.

OUT! CAUGHT! Oh, that wasn't needed at all, that too after a 25-run over. Rahul Chopra is visibly disappointed and rightly so. Tanzim Hasan Sakib takes pace off and bowls the off cutter, on a length and slightly wide of the off pole. Chopra goes reaching for it and tries to loft it away but miscues it wide of backward point where Mahedi Hasan takes a good running catch over his shoulder. Chopra departs for 35 (22) and UAE lose their fourth wicket.
Rahul Chopra (wk) c M Hasan b TH Sakib 35 (22b 5x4 1x6)

SIX! That is unreal hitting, a hat-trick of sixes for Asif Khan and Mahedi Hasan has conceded 49 runs in just 3 overs. Over the wicket, bowled flat but right in the slot on off and middle, Asif picks it up and whacks it over long on for a huge six.
SIX! Oh, that's even bigger! Full and right in the slot on middle and leg, Asif Khan simply clears the front leg and swings it a long way over wide long on for a biggie.
SIX! That's begging to be hit! A high full toss around middle, Asif Khan manages to get a hold of it and heaves to over deep mid-wicket for a biggie.
Around the wicket now, bowled a tad short on middle and leg, Chopra pulls it through mid-wicket for one and looks for the second but Asif sends him back.
On the shorter side and wide outside off, Asif waits back before cutting it behind point for a single.
Wide! Slows it up a bit now and bowls it well wide of the off stump line, left alone by Asif.
FOUR! That was hit hard! Darted in on middle and leg, in the slot, Asif Khan takes the front leg out and smacks it flat and wide of deep mid-wicket for a boundary.
Hard length, wide of the off stump, Chopra leans across and hits it away wide of swepeer cover for a couple of runs.

Oh, a direct hit and that would have been gone! Back of a length and outside off, Chopra nudges it down to short third and Asif Khan starts to run from the other end. Chopra send him back as Mahedi Hasan misses the direct hit at the bowler's end.
Banged in short and outside off, Rahul Chopra leans back to play the ramp but misses. A stifled appeal for caught behind as well.
Back of a length, angled into the pads, nudged away past square leg for a single.

OUT! CAUGHT! Tanzim Hasan Sakib comes back on and gets the big wicket of Muhammad Waseem. A very well-directed short ball, right at the rib cage and Waseem gets really cramped up. He still tries to go through with the pull and ends up miscuing it wide of short fine leg as one hand comes off the handle as well. Mustafizur Rahman takes a simple catch to his left and Waseem has to depart for 54 (38), he did look a bit edgy after the drinks break. Asif Khan walks out the middle as the next batter.
Muhammad Waseem (c) c M Rahman b TH Sakib 54 (39b 7x4 2x6)
Nicely bowled! Slower one, floated up, full and wide, deceiving the better as Muhammad Waseem is through his shot way too early.
Flatter one again, on a length and around off, Waseem flat-bats it on the bounce to long on and picks up a single. Just 5 off it.

Around the wicket, darted in full and around leg, Muhammad Waseem clears the front leg to flick it away but misses and gets hit on the back leg. A huge appeal but turned down, clearly pitching outside leg.
On a dragged length and over off, punched off the back foot down to long on for one more.
Fuller one, outside off and swerving away, Waseem hits it along the ground and down to long off for a single.
Excellent running! Fractionally short on middle and leg, Muhammad Waseem rocks back and swats it flat to the right of deep mid-wicket and picks up a couple of runs.
Quick and flat, turning back in from around off, Waseem jams it out on the off side.
Flighted, on off. Rahul Chopra defends it back to the bowler.

FIFTY for Muhammad Waseem! Short, wide outside off. Muhammad Waseem cuts it away toward sweeper cover and gets the single to complete his half-century. He lifts his willow up, thanking the pavilion and the supporters in the stadium.
Fuller on off. Rahul Chopra sweeps it toward sqaure leg for one.
Fuller, on middle. Muhammad Waseem sweeps it toward deep sqaure leg for one.
Tossed up, outside off. Muhammad Waseem cuts it but straight t the backward point this time.
FOUR! EXCEPTIONAL! Tad fuller, wide outside off. Muhammad Waseem trusts the width of the delivery and cuts it hard toward the deep cover-point fence for a boundary.

FOUR! Boundary at the end of the very economical over! Mustafizur Rahman bowls it slower and fuller on leg. Rahul Chopra rotates and pulls it toward the left of the deep fine leg fielder for his fifth boundary.
Full-length delivery, on middle. Rahul Chopra prods and keeps it out.
Slower and fuller, on leg. Muhammad Waseem tucks it toward deep sqaure leg for one.
Back of a length, pitching it just outside off and angling it away from the batter. Muhammad Waseem offers no shots to it.
Short, on leg, angling toward middle. Rahul Chopra pulls it gently toward deep fine leg for one.
Back of a length, on middle and off. Rahul Chopra hops a bit and blocks it back to the bowler.
Tossed up, down the leg. Rahul Chopra sweeps it toward short fine for one.
Fuller, outside off. Muhammad Waseem drives it toward long off for one.

FOUR! 12 runs from the over so far and still two deliveries left! Flighted, on off and middle. Muhammad Waseem gets on his one knee and sweeps it from the middle of his willow toward far right of the deep square leg fielder for another boundary.
A bit quicker and short. Muhammad Waseem dabs it back to the bowler.
FOUR! Runs are coming thick and fast! Tossed up, fuller, on middle and leg. Muhammad Waseem sweeps it toward deep square leg fence for four.

FOUR LEG BYES! Fuller, on leg, angling it down the leg. Muhammad Waseem tries to flick but misses the shot. The ball brushes the outer part of his pad and rolls away toward deep fine leg fence for four runs.
FOUR! Rahul Chopra is on fire! Back of a length, well wide outside off. Chopra stands tall and steers it toward the left of the backward point fielder for four more runs added into his account.
Short, wide outside off. Rahul Chopra looks to push it away but misses.
SIX! Innovative this time! On a length, just outside off. Rahul Chopra shuffles across the stump and scoops it over the deep fine leg fence for half a dozen.

FOUR! More runs from Rahul Chopra! Fuller, wide outside off. Rahul Chopra punches the delivery wide of the cover fielder. The fielder sprints hard and puts a dive but fails to win the race with the rolling ball.
FOUR! Poor effort at the deep! Short, on off. Rahul Chopra pulls it toward far left of the deep mid-wicket fielder. The fielder has a chase but fails to keep the ball inside the park.
Back of a length, on off. Muhammad Waseem swats it across the line toward deep mid-wicket for one run.
Short, on middle and leg. Muhammad Waseem makes a room and slaps it towards cover for a single.
Drags his length back, outside off. Muhammad Waseem slaps it hard but to the hands of the cover fielder.
Flatter and fuller, just outside off, turning it away. Muhammad Waseem attempts a sweep but misses on the outer edge.
Slightly short, outside off. Muhammad Waseem cuts it straight to the hands of the fielder in point.
Fuller, just outside off. Rahul Chopra looks to pull yet again but catches a bit inner edge onto his pad. The ball rolls toward short third and they crosses for a single.
FOUR! Beautifully done! Tanvir Islam bowls it fuller, pitching it just outside off. Rahul Chopra gets down on his one knee and sweeps it uppishly toward deep square leg fence for a boundary.
FOUR! Streaky! Slightly pitched up and outside off, Muhammad Waseem stays leg side of the ball and throws his hands at it, gets a top edge that flies down to deep third for a boundary.
A bit slower now, fuller, on leg and middle. Muhammad Waseem hangs back and blocks it down.
Back of a length and around off, Rahul looks to defend off the back foot but gets an inside edge towards square leg and picks up a single.
Nagging length, attacking off and middle, Rahul Chopra blocks it off.

OUT! EDGED AND GONE! Mustafizur Rahman keeps bowling on that in-between length, around middle and gets the ball to naturally angle away from the right-hander. Alishan Sharafu shimmies down the track, backing away as well as he tries to go over covers. Only manages an outside edge through to the keeper and Jaker Ali makes no mistake. United Arab Emirates 2 down already!
Alishan Sharafu c J Ali b M Rahman 1 (3b 0x4 0x6)
Nagging length, on off, angling away, Alishan Sharafu looks to drive but gets an inside edge onto the back leg. That one nearly rolled back onto the stumps.
Good-length delivery, sliding onto the pads, stylishly flicked away to deep square leg for a single by Alishan Sharafu.

OUT! CAUGHT! Hasan Mahmud strikes in his first over! This is bowled a bit shorter, into the deck and around off. Muhammad Zohaib looks to swivel onto the back foot and pull but the ball gets big on him and he ends up miscuing it completely towards mid on. Najmul Hossain Shanto is the substitute fielder over there and he takes a simple catch to get rid of the debutant.
Muhammad Zohaib c sub Najmul Hossain Shanto b Hasan Mahmud 9 (9b 2x4 0x6)
Hits the deck hard and angles it just across the off stump, Zohaib stays upright and jams it down in front of mid off.
Hard length around off, Waseem stays back and pushes it down to covers for a single.
Beaten! Perfect length, in the channel around off, darting back in, Waseem has a poke at it but is well beaten.
Starts off with a length ball at the pads, Zohaib misses the flick and the ball goes off the thigh pads to backward square leg. They get a leg bye.
FOUR! Just evades the keeper. Another short ball, angled in at the batter, Muhammad Waseem backs away and manages to get something on the pull, getting it past the keeper and into the fine leg fence.
Swing and a miss! Hard length on off and middle, this one nips back in after pitching and a long way too. Waseem misses the heave across the line and that is a good diving grab from the keeper.
FOUR! Another cute shot and another boundary for Waseem! Banged in short and around off, Waseem waits well and backs away before just ramping it down to deep third for four more runs.
Oh, a great comeback from the bowler! A spicy bumper from Tanzim, aimed in right towards the on-rushing batter. Waseem just about manages to sway away from the line of the bll.
FOUR! Very well played! Short and at the body again, Muhammad Waseem is quick to back away and plays it with an angled bat, perfectly behind point and picks up a boundary.
Quick and short, over middle and angling in, Waseem looks to pull but is hurried and gets hit on the bodyline.
FOUR! The UAE openers are on a roll, 19 off the second over! Tossed up on off and middle, Zohaib goes down on one knee and slogs it over wide mid on for another boundary.
FOUR! Top shot! Fractionally short and wide, Muhammad Zohaib is quick to back away and cuts it firmly behind point for his first boundary in international cricket.
A tad short on middle, flatter too, Waseem backs away and swats it down to long on for a single.
FOUR! Full and angling onto the pads, Muhammad Waseem sits down and brooms it away down to the vacant backward square leg fence for a boundary.
Quick and short, darted into the batter, Waseem backs away and jams it to covers.
SIX! Picked up and dispatched! Shorter to begin with, angling into middle and leg, Muhammad Waseem hangs back and muscles the ball over deep square leg for a biggie.
Just back of a length, over middle and leg, Zohaib jars at it and gets hit on the gloves. Just 5 off the first over of the chase.

In the air... safe! Back of a length and outside off, Muhammad Waseem stands tall and swings across the line but gets a top edge down to deep third. The ball falls short of Tawhid Hridoy and they get a single.
Shortish length, at the body, Zohaib fails to flick it away and the ball goes off the body behind square leg. They get a leg bye.
Just short of a length and over middle, Zohaib gets cramped up and hops up to block it off.
Good running! Fuller in length and around off, Muhammad Waseem punches it just wide of mid off and scampers through for one.
Back of a length and around off, Muhammad Zohaib hops up and dabs it down to deep third to get off the mark with a single.
Wide! A loosener to begin with. On a good length, from over the wicket but sprayed down the leg side for a wide.

Finishes well, does Muhammad Jawadullah! Hard length again and outside off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib swings across the line but misses and goes nowhere as the keeper scores a direct hit at the batter's end. A dot to end and Bangladesh finish with 191/7 on the board!
Back of a length and around off, Tanvir looks to play off the back foot but miscues it badly in front of covers for a single.
FIVE WIDES! Oh, a shocking delivery to spoil the over! A full toss, sprayed down the leg side and the keeper misses it as well. The ball trickles down to the fence for five extra runs.
This is turning out to be a fine final over from Muhammad Jawadullah. Hard length, wide outside off, Tanvir swings across the line but misses.

No run signalled! Good length outside off, Islam looks to cut but misses. The keeper throws the ball back to the bowler who doesn't collect and the batters then try to sneak in a single. However, the umpire deems that the ball was already dead.
Nails the yorker now, around off, Tanvir Islam can only jam it back towards the bowler.

OUT! TIMBER! 100 and out for Parvez Hossain Emon! Muhammad Jawadullah steams in from over the wicket and bowls a hard-length delivery around off. This one pitches and nips back in as Parvez looks to hang back and swing across the line. Parvez is down for pace and the ball knocks over the top of the off stump as Jawadullah gets his fourth wicket. Parvez departs for a sensational 100 (54).
Parvez Hossain Emon b M Jawadullah 100 (54b 5x4 9x6)

What a moment for Parvez Hossain Emon! A maiden T20I ton to savour and he becomes just the second Bangladeshi batter to achieve a T20I century. Slower one on the pads, nudged away behind square leg for a single. Parvez gets across and soaks in the applause from the crowd. A fine, fine effort from the southpaw.
Hard length over the stumps, hit away down to long on for a single.
Matiullah keeps taking pace off and bowls it a bit short and wide. Tanzim waits and slices it away towards deep cover before picking up a couple of runs.
A slower bumper now, quite high and outside off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib can't connect.
FOUR! Floated up, full and wide outside off, Tanzim manages to get under it and lofts it over covers for a boundary.

NO BALL! Another catch taken in the deep, but hang on, Matiullah Khan has yet again overstepped. This is just sub-par from the debutant. Takes pace off and bowls it short at the bodyline, Tanzim Hasan Sakib picks it up and pulls it straight into the hands of the deep square leg fielder. However, a Free Hit will now follow...
Swing and a miss! Slower one, on a good length and outside off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib swings across the line but misses.
A low full toss on middle, angling it in, Parvez Hossain Emon clips it away in front of deep mid-wicket and comes back for the second. He moves on to 99 now!
Hard length around leg, Tanzim fails to flick it away as the ball goes off the pads to short fine leg. They get a leg bye.
Top delivery! Nails the yorker, bowling it around off and angling it across. Tanzim Hasan Sakib fails to jam it out.

OUT! LBW! Seemed pretty adjacent that one, with the impact being the only area of concern. Slightly pitched up by Muhammad Jawadullah, bowling it around off and angling it in. Shamim Hossain takes a couple of steps to the off side and looks to flick it over mid-wicket but misses. The ball crashes into the pads and up goes the finger. A third wicket of the evening for Muhammad Jawadullah and that also brings up 50 T20I wickets for him.
Shamim Hossain lbw M Jawadullah 6 (5b 1x4 0x6)
A proper short one this time, outside off, this one hurries off the deck as well. Shamim looks to cut but misses.
FOUR! Short of a length, angled in towards the hips, Shamim Hossain swivels and helps the pull down to the vacant backward square leg fence for a boundary.
Another off-paced delivery, around off, Shamim just pats it into the off side and picks up a single. 20 off that over!
Slower one, into the pitch and around leg, nudged away just behind square leg for an easy single.

SIX! That's easy pickings for someone who is batting on 90. A juicy full toss, outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon gets behind the ball nicely and hammers it over long off for a biggie. Just one hit away now from a maiden T20I ton.
Goes full and wide again and gets it spot-on this time. Parvez Hossain Emon shuffles to drive but gets an inside edge down to fine leg for a couple of runs.
Wide! Matiullah Khan under immense pressure now. Full and wide, a bit too wide outside off though. Parvez leaves it alone.

FOUR! Parvez Hossain Emon gets the life and continues on his merry way! Very full and angled well across off, Parvez reaches for it and manages to slash it over extra cover for a boundary. He moves on to 88 now.

Oh, a huge relief for UAE, or is it? Replays show that Matiullah Khan has overstepped here. Khan delivers a low full toss around off, always difficult to get under those. Parvez Hossain Emon tries to get under it but ends up slicing it high towards long off. Muhammad Waseem takes the crucial catch just inside the ropes, but it will be a NO BALL! Free hit to follow...

FOUR! Oh, that's gone like a tracer bullet! Overpitched and outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon shuffles to the off side, gets low and smacks it flat and to the left of long off for a boundary. The 150 is up for Bangladesh!
Shortens the length, bowling it on middle and leg, worked away off the back foot in front of mid-wicket for a run.
Wide! Floated up on a length and well outside off, the googly turns further away and a wide is called.
SIX! That is massive! Tossed up at the stumps, not quite full but Parvez Hossain Emon swings through the line and dispatches it over the sight screen for a biggie. New ball, please!
Sees the batter moving past the off stump and fires it well wide, Parvez leaves it in hopes of a wide which is not given.
A bit fuller and around leg, Shamim Hossain leans on and flicks it away through mid-wicket for a single.

OUT! CAUGHT! Muhammad Zuhaib does pick up a wicket after all that bashing. Has the heart to toss it up, around middle and leg. Jaker Ali goes down on one knee, looking to slog it over the mid-wicket fence but ends up slicing it high towards long on. Sanchit Sharma over there, settles just inside the ropes and takes a well-judged catch. Bangladesh now 5 down for 140!
Jaker Ali (wk) c S Sharma b M Zuhaib 13 (14b 0x4 1x6)
SIX! Zuhaib is taking a hammering here. A real drag down, on the pads, Jaker Ali has all the time in the world to rock back and pull it over deep square leg for a biggie.
That one nearly scraped through! The arm-ball from Haider, fired in on off and this one darts back in quickly. Ali rocks back and cuts it off the stumps past backward point for a single.
Oh, missed opportunity! A juicy full toss on off and middle, Parvez Hossain Emon goes hard at it and miscues it back over the bowler's head for just a run.
Flatter delivery, around middle, Ali rocks back and pulls it to deep mid-wicket for one more.
Fired in full and towards the leg peg, Emon drills it down to long on for a single.
SIX! Parvez Hossain Emon is relentless! Shorter in length, angled in towards off stump, Emon forces the lofted shot and tonks the ball over long on for another biggie.
On a dragged length, around middle and leg, Ali stays back and nudges it behind square leg for a single.
SIX! This time, though, Emon gets a good chunk of it! Tossed up on off, Parvez Hossain Emon sits down and muscles the slog sweep over deep square leg for a biggie.
Beaten! Pushed through wide of the off stump line, Parvez Hossain Emon does down on one knee and looks to fetch the slog but can't reach it.
A biot too full and on leg, hammered down to long on for a single.
Oh, what was Jaker Ali doing there? Tossed up on the pads, Jaker backs away to open up the off side but gets beaten in the flight. The leggie turns but just whizzes past the leg stump.
Pushed through flatter and around off, gets it to grip a bit as well. Jake tentatively plays it out.
Stump-to-stump bowling, on the fuller side, Jaker watchfully blocks it off.
Fuller, on middle and leg. Jaker Ali tickles it toward deep sqaure leg one.
Fullish, on middle and leg. Jaker Ali nudges it toward his leg side.
Another short one, outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon cuts it toward the deep cover fielder for one run.
Short, outside off, turning it away from the batter. Parvez Hossain Emon looks to slap at it but misses.
Fuller, outside off. Jaker Ali knocks it toward long off for a single.
Tossed up, turning in. Jaker Ali tucks it toward mid-wicket.
Fuller, outside off. Jaker Ali drives it toward sweeper cover for one.

OUT! EDGED AND TAKEN! Muhammad Jawadullah gets another one in his back-to-back overs. Bowls it on a good length, shaping it away from the right hander. Mahedi Hasan strides halfway and looks to push it toward cover but gets a slight outer edge. Rahul Chopra, behind the stump shuffles toward his right and gets the catch.
Mahedi Hasan c R Chopra b M Jawadullah 2 (5b 0x4 0x6)
Dugs a short one, on middle and off. Parvez Hossain Emon attempts to pull but fails to get the middle. The ball loops and drops dead toward the off side of the batter. Single taken!
Fuller, angling across the batter. Mahedi Hasan stabs it toward cover and crosses for one.
Short, wide outside off. Mahedi Hasan cuts it toward point and gets no run.
Back of a length, outside off. Mahedi Hasan inner edges the delivery toward short fine leg.

Tossed up, outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon looks tot sweep but gets a slight inner edge. The ball rolls toward short mid. The keeper has a shy toward bowler's end as the batters takes a single. The ball hits the stumps and deflects toward mid on. The batters gets an extra run.
A bit fuller, on leg. Parvez Hossain Emon bowls it back to the bowler.
Short, on leg. Mahedi Hasan flicks it toward short fine leg for one.

OUT! CAUGHT! Much needed wicket for United Arab Emirates! Dhruv Parashar drags his length back, once again, outside off. The ball has some extra bounce after pitching. Tawhid Hridoy attempts to cut it over the head of the backward point fielder but fails to get the required elevation. The ball flies straight to the head of the fielder and Muhammad Zohaib makes no mistake to catch that one.
Tawhid Hridoy c M Zohaib b D Parashar 20 (15b 1x4 1x6)
Short, around off. Parvez Hossain Emon slaps it toward cover for one run.

TWO WIDES! Free runs for Bangladesh! Short, turns it down the leg. Tawhid Hridoy looks to tuck it toward his leg side but misses. Rahul Chopra fails to glove and the ball rolls toward short fine leg. They cross!
Full-length delivery, on off. Parvez Hossain Emon prods, leans on the delivery and drives it gently toward sweeper cover for one.
A touch shorter on middle, Tawhid Hridoy works it into the leg side to the left of deep mid-wicket. The call is for two straight away and the batters do eventually complete two runs.
Fuller goggly that pitches on leg and spins away to end up on middle stump line, Parvez Hossain Emon looks to flick it and gets a leading edge that goes to the left of point. Single taken.
Shorter leg break on middle, Tawhid Hridoy works it into the leg side and sneaks in a quick single as the bowler himself runs towards the ball and cuts it off.
Drags his length back does Muhammad Zuhaib and bowls a leg break on middle, Tawhid Hridoy pushes it back to the bowler.
FOUR! A touch fuller on middle, Tawhid Hridoy again back away to make some room and drills the drive to the left of long off for a four.

SIX! Tossed up leg break on middle, Tawhid Hridoy moves away to make some room and lofts this one over the flying long off fielder for six. The long off fielder did get a hand to it but couldn't quite stop the six.
Short and on the pads, Tawhid Hridoy looks to work it into the leg side and misses it. The ball hits his back pad and goes into the leg side. The batters sneak in a leg bye.
Tossed up delivery on middle, Tawhid Hridoy hangs back and pushes it to short cover.
Full and wide outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon again drives this down the ground, this time to the fielder. Single taken.
FOUR! Drilled! Overpitched, just outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon again sitting deep in his crease swings through the line as the ball races away to the right of long off for a four.
A touch fuller on off, Tawhid Hridoy drives this down the ground to long off for a single.
A touch short on off, Tawhid Hridoy pushes it to short cover. Dot ball.

FOUR BYES! Full and outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon again looks to go big as he tries to go for the lofted drive down the ground. The ball moves away as it beats the batter as well as the wicket-keeper and goes to the boundary for four byes.

SIX! Parvez Hossain Emon is on fire! Sanchit Sharma goes for the attempted yorker, and ends up bowling a full toss on off. Parvez Hossain Emon was ready for it as he goes deep in his crease, sits down on one knee and swings through the line as the ball goes sailing over the bowler's head for a six.
Slower delivery on a length, outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon pushes it to short cover. Dot ball.
SIX! Full again, six again! Full, just outside off, in the slot, Parvez Hossain Emon clears his front leg and launches this one high over long on for another six.

SIX! Up, up and away! Short of a length, just outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon stands tall and hammers it over long on for six more runs. There is a fielder patroling around the fence but the ball sails over the head of the fielder.
On a length, just outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon blocks it out.
Much fuller, just outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon jams it back to the bowler but Ali fumbles and gave away a single.
Full, on off. Tawhid Hridoy pushes it toward the left of the cover fielder. They cross.

Tossed up, fuller, just outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon comes down the track and looks for a heave across the line. The ball gets a thick outside edge but lucky for Emon that the ball lands much short of deep backward point fielder. Single taken in between!
Short, on off. Tawhid Hridoy rocks back and drives it toward sweeper cover for one.
Full-length delivery, on the stumps. Parvez Hossain Emon pushes it toward long on for one.
Fuller, just outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon punches itt oward backward point for no run.
Fuller, on off. Parvez Hossain Emon pushes it toward cover and gets a quick single.
Back of a length, around off. Tawhid Hridoy punches it toward point and gets one run.

That was close! A good-length delivery, just outside off. Tawhid Hridoy looks to forward block the delivery but ends up getting late. The ball hits the toe end of the willow and bounces just past the off stump for a few inches.
Short, just outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon steers it toward cover-point and gets one run.
Full-length delivery, on middle. Tawhid Hridoy flicks it toward right of deep mid-wicket and gets three runs. Hrindoy is off his mark.

OUT! LBW! The change of bringing Muhammad Jawadullah has worked for United Arab Emirates and they got the big fish out of the pond! Jawadullah, searching for the yorker, bowls it much fuller on leg. Litton Das attempts to flick it off his pad, but the ball sneaks past his inner edge. The ball thumps his lower pad and the Umpire raises his finger for the roaring appeal from UAE.
Litton Das (c) lbw M Jawadullah 11 (8b 0x4 1x6)
On a length, just outside off. Litton Das guides it toward cover-point for a single.
Leg bye! Short, on the batter's body lane. Parvez Hossain Emon attempts to pull but has a blow on his fore arm. The ball rolls toward his leg side and gets a single.

SIX! That is something we call a perfect shot! Matiullah Khan bowls it fuller length, on off. Parvez Hossain Emon lunges toward the delivery, loads his willow and uses his bottom hand to hoist it over long on to the second tier of the stadium.
Short, just outside off. Litton Das dabs it toward point for one.
LEG BYE! Fuller, pitching outside leg. Parvez Hossain Emon looks to flick but the ball brushes the outer pad and rolls toward fine leg for one.

FOUR! The ball moved like a bullet! Hard-length delivery, just outside off, angling away from the batter. Parvez Hossain Emon stays in his stance and punches it from the middle of his willow between the gap of the cover and extra cover for another boundary added into his account.
SIX! HAMMERED AWAY! Short of a length from Haider Ali, bowls it on middle and off. Litton Das clears his front foot and pulls it hard up and over deep mid-wicket fence for six more runs.
Much fuller, on off. Parvez Hossain Emon jams it away toward the gap of the cover for one.
An appeal for LBW but umpire turned it down. Fuller, just outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon looks to swipe it but misses and thumps his pad. The ball is clearly going outside off.
Short, outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon hangs back and punches it toward right of the bowler.
Fuller, outside off. Litton Das pushes it toward cover-point for one.
Fullish, on middle and leg. Litton Das pushes it straight to the man at the cover region.
Tossed up, just outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon looks to sweep but misses and thumps his pad.
Fuller, just outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon pushes it toward cover.

SIX! BOOM! Parvez Hossain Emon is going aggressive on the UAE bowlers! Too much fuller, on off. Parvez Hossain Emon plants his front foot, leans on the delivery and launches it hard over long on fence for half a dozen.
Short, on off. Parvez Hossain Emon punches it toward rigth of long off for a couple of runs.
FOUR! Oh... glorious from Emon! Tossed it up, fuller on leg. Parvez Hossain Emon gets down on his knee and sweeps it toward left of the short fine leg fielder for four runs.
Fuller, outside off. Parvez Hossain Emon drives it toward his off side.
Full, on off. Litton Das nudges it across the line toward deep sqaure leg for a couple of runs.
On a length, just outside off. Litton Das shuffls across the stump and misses the flick.

OUT! Matiullah Khan draws the first blood for his side! Bowls it fuller, wide outside off, angling it away from the batter. Tanzid Hasan extends his arm to slap it over the cover region but gets nicked on the outer edge. The ball zips toward the left of the keeper and Rahul Chopra gets the catch safely into his gloves.
Tanzid Hasan c R Chopra b M Khan 10 (9b 1x4 1x6)
Fuller, outside off. Tanzid Hasan drives it toward mid on.
That's much better from Matiullah Khan! A bit slower, back of a length, pitching it just outside off and swings it back. Tanzid Hasan hangs back and looks to nudge it toward his leg side but misses.
Back of a length now, on middle and off. Parvez Hossain Emon pulls it hard but straight to the wide mid on fielder for one.
WIDE! The free-hit stays! Once again fuller, but sprays it wide outside off.
NO BALL! Fuller, but way wide outside off. Matiullah Khan overstepped his first delivery. Free-hit upcoming.
SIX! BOOM! This goes miles away from the park! Dhruv Parashar drags his length short, on middle and leg. Tanzid Hasan swovels it across the line and pulls it over deep square leg fence for a biggie.
Tossed up, on off. Tanzid Hasan punches it toward cover for no runs.
Fuller, outside off. Tanzid Hasan pushes it toward cover.
FOUR! The first boundary of the inning! What a way to start the inning! Full-length delivery, on off and middle. Tanzid Hasan slogs it up and over mid on and gets four runs.
Fuller, drifting it toward the off stump. Tanzid Hasan hangs back and keeps it outside off.
Dhruv Parashar comes from over the stumps and bowls it fuller, just outside off. Tanzid Hasan pushes it toward cover for no run.
